class  Vector

Detailed Description

Develops a quantization scheme using vector quantization.

Author:
valliappa.lakshmanan

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.VectorQuantizer.VectorQuantizer ( LatLonGrid[]  params,
int  K 
)

Parameters:
params where to get the vectors from. These grids should be normalized.
K 
00058                                                       {
00059         int nrows = params[0].getNumLat();
00060         int ncols = params[0].getNumLon();
00061         // 1. initialize centroid with mean
00062         centroids = new Vector[1];
00063         centroids[0] = new Vector(params.length); // zero
00064         for (int p=0; p < params.length; ++p){
00065             int N = 0;
00066             for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00067                 int val = params[p].getValue(i,j);
00068                 if ( val != params[p].getMissing() ){
00069                     centroids[0].values[p] += val;
00070                     ++N;
00071                 }
00072             }
00073             if (N > 0){
00074                 centroids[0].values[p] /= N;
00075             }
00076         }
00077         System.out.println(this);
00078         while ( centroids.length < K ){
00079             // 2. split the centroids
00080             final double epsilon = 0.1;
00081             centroids = split(centroids, epsilon);
00082             // System.out.println(this);
00083             // 3. update centroid
00084             centroids = computeCentroids(params);
00085             // System.out.println(this);
00086         }
00087         
00088         System.out.println(this);
00089     }

int edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.VectorQuantizer.getBinNumber ( LatLonGrid[]  params,
int  x,
int  y 
) 

00183                                                               {
00184         // closest centroid wins
00185         int best = 0;
00186         double mindist = centroids[0].computeDist(params, x, y);
00187         for (int p=1; p < centroids.length; ++p){
00188             double dist = centroids[p].computeDist(params, x, y);
00189             if (dist < mindist){
00190                 mindist = dist;
00191                 best = p;
00192             }
00193         }
00194         return best;
00195     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.VectorQuantizer.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00223                                                             {
00224         // create output directory
00225         File outdir = OutputDirectory.getDefault("quantizer");
00226 
00227         // read input
00228         LatLonGrid conus = SurfaceAlbedo.read(SurfaceAlbedo.CONUS, 100);
00229         
00230         // compute a few local and texture measures
00231         LocalMeasures local = new LocalMeasures(conus, 11, 11);
00232         LatLonGrid mean = local.getMean();
00233         // LatLonGrid stdev = local.getStdDeviation();
00234         Histogram hist = HistogramBinSelection.createBasedOnRange(conus);
00235         StructuralMeasures texture = new StructuralMeasures(conus, 11, 11, hist.getMin(), hist.getIncr(), hist.getNumBins());
00236         LatLonGrid uniformity = texture.getUniformity()[0];
00237         
00238         LatLonGrid[] params = new LatLonGrid[]{ conus, mean, uniformity };
00239         params = normalize(params);
00240         
00241         for (int k=4; k < 32; k *= 2){ // 4, 8, 16
00242             VectorQuantizer quant = new VectorQuantizer(params, k);
00243             LatLonGrid banded = quant.band(params);
00244             KmlWriter.write(banded, outdir, "vecquant_" + k, PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00245         }
00246     }

static LatLonGrid edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.VectorQuantizer.normalize ( LatLonGrid  data  )  [static]

The output grid ranges from 0 to 100.

Parameters:
input 
Returns:
00104                                                        {
00105         LatLonGrid result = LatLonGrid.copyOf(data);
00106         result.setMissing(-1);
00107         // find range
00108         int min = data.getMissing();
00109         int max = data.getMissing();
00110         int nrows = data.getNumLat();
00111         int ncols = data.getNumLon();
00112         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00113             int val = data.getValue(i,j);
00114             if ( val != data.getMissing() ){
00115                 if (min == data.getMissing() || val < min){
00116                     min = val;
00117                 }
00118                 if (max == data.getMissing() || val > max){
00119                     max = val;
00120                 }
00121             }
00122         }
00123         for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00124             int val = data.getValue(i,j);
00125             if ( val != data.getMissing() ){
00126                 result.setValue(i, j, (int)Math.round((100.0*(val-min))/max) );
00127             } else {
00128                 result.setValue(i, j, result.getMissing() );
00129             }
00130         }
00131         return result;
00132     }

static LatLonGrid [] edu.ou.asgbook.imgstat.VectorQuantizer.normalize ( LatLonGrid[]  params  )  [static] 

00091                                                              {
00092         LatLonGrid[] norm = new LatLonGrid[params.length];
00093         for (int i=0; i < params.length; ++i){
00094             norm[i] = normalize(params[i]);
00095         }
00096         return norm;
00097     }
